definition: authentic taste/plain cooked/natural flavor (without spices and seasonings)

sentences.english: Large wine cellar with constant temperature and humidity, keeps the most original flavor and sentiment.

sentences.english: Use water from mountain creeks, original taste and no spices.

sentences.english: An emphasis on preserving the natural flavor of the food is the hallmark of Cantonese cuisine.

sentences.english: Taste the fragrant glutinous rice directly or with sauces as you like.

sentences.english: However the way to eat them is quite democratic: you yourself season the cooked food with salt or pepper.

sentences.english: But what Lin Heung does offer is a tasty and unmediated slice of Old Hong Kong.
